output_list.reason: Allows the owner to mint unlimited tokens, which can devalue the token and lead to financial losses for holders.
Anyone can transfer tokens, which can be exploited by malicious actors to siphon funds from the contract.
Anyone can transfer tokens on behalf of others, which can lead to unauthorized transfers and financial losses.
The function name and modifier usage suggest a constructor, which is not the intended use case and can lead to unauthorized changes.
The contract can be DoSed by setting the balance too high, preventing new kings from being crowned.
